body:
Recently, I've been getting into walls. There are usually around 2-3 people on each team which makes it pretty hard to get exp. I mean, you prepare really hard for 10 minutes only to end up getting 0 kills. I believe players should earn exp. in more ways than just getting kills.

Opinions?
body_tagged:

Opinions?
title: {Walls} Earning EXP.

replies.body:
Hi Xiphias.
You know the point of minecraft isnt to get xp.
Its to have fun.
as long as you have fun it dosent really matter how much xp you get, right?

replies.body:
Trust me, I've been having fun :)

But, I just think there should be another way of earning exp. considering there are hardly ever that many people on each team. I'm not really sure if it's just me.

I agree there should be another way to earn Exp.
If you have any ideas, you should find a way to contact a Map developer or moderator and tell them what you think.
You have a right to free speech ;)

replies.body: With the emerald rank you get 8xp per kill and 10 per win. When you start yolo rushing when the walls fall you will get tons of xp.
replies.body_tagged: With the emerald rank you get 8xp per kill and 10 per win. When you start yolo rushing when the walls fall you will get tons of xp.

reply_to.body: With the emerald rank you get 8xp per kill and 10 per win. When you start yolo rushing when the walls fall you will get tons of xp.
reply_to.body_tagged: With the emerald rank you get 8xp per kill and 10 per win. When you start yolo rushing when the walls fall you will get tons of xp.

replies.body:
Walls defensively needs to reward more xp. 

In a 10 minute game of nexus I might be able to get ~25 depending on the map, ect. That equates to about 50 xp + 5xp if I win. In walls it is less consistent. I might be able to get 2-3 kills a game. 3 kills is 12 xp + 6xp if I win.

So in 10 minutes of nexus I can get 55xp and in 10 minutes of walls (and matches go longer, around 20 minutes!) I can get 17xp. 

Let's recap:
•Nexus: 55xp per 10 minutes
•Walls: 17xp per 20 minutes

it really should be 5xp for making it untill the walls fall, 8xp per kill and 5xp for a win.

replies.body: I know but you do gain a lot of xp per kill even as a non-donator. I think its fine people that play walls aren't going for prestige's they like  the fun.
replies.body_tagged: I know but you do gain a lot of xp per kill even as a non-donator. I think its fine people that play walls aren't going for prestige's they like  the fun.

replies.body: No actually, you don't. I earn 4xp per kill and 5xp per win. Let's I am a pro and get 5 kills and a win every game I play. That's 25xp per a 15-25 minute game  and that is not nearly as much as playing Nexus or Nebula.
replies.body_tagged: No actually, you don't. I earn 4xp per kill and 5xp per win. Let's I am a pro and get 5 kills and a win every game I play. That's 25xp per a 15-25 minute game  and that is not nearly as much as playing Nexus or Nebula.
